speaker: Patient 2's Mother
dialog: But everyday, on and on, he gets more and more addicted watching everything burn.

speaker: Patient 2's Mother
dialog: Everyone wants him to stop, which mentally breaks him.

speaker: Patient 2's Mother
dialog: I just want him to be happy, but I didn't think it would come to this.

speaker: Psych
dialog: Hmm, a note from the patient's mother, huh? It looks like no matter what the patient does, his mother will always be with him.

speaker: Psych
dialog: But, this is the patient's house. It's up in flames, yet there is no one around.

speaker: Psych
dialog: Whatever the case is, I should keep this note to bring back to the patient. Maybe it will help cure him.

speaker: Psych
dialog: I wonder if there are more notes around here. I need to retrieve them fast before they burn up into ashes.
